CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.itemPricePath.hi: Path to item price value (e.g., 'system.price.value' for D&D5e). Leave blank to use detected system.
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.itemDenomination: Path to item currency denomination (e.g., 'system.price.denomination' for D&D5e). Leave blank to use detected system.

Currency Denomination (e.g., credits, gp, units). Leave blank to use Item Currency Path or detected system. Campaign Codex will automatically detect the value and denomination for items based on the active game system (e.g., Dungeons and Dragons 5e, Pathfinder 2e, Starfinder, Savage Worlds Adventure Edition, Pathfinder 1e, Old-School Essentials and Daggerheart).
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.hideBaseCost.hin: If you don't want the base cost visible, or the system doesn't have a price path you can set this to hide the column in the inventory tab. Close and reopen sheets to update.
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.sortCardsAlpha.h: If On, cards will be displayed A-Z
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.runonlyonce.name: Welcome Message - Disabled
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.runonlyonce.hint: If On, you won't see the Welcome message
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.useOrganizedFold: Automatically create and organise Campaign Codex journals in folders
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.hideByPermission: Hide cards if the user does not have observer or higher ownership of the journal or item
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.settings.resetItemPathsBu: Enable this option and save to reset item price and currency paths to D&D5e defaults (system.price.value and system.price.denomination)
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.notifications.itemPricePa: Item price paths reset to D&D5e defaults
